definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: How did Mr. Silk get the job?
sentences.chinese: 思科先生是怎樣得到這份美差的呢？

sentences.english: We have a Cisco E300 router as well.
sentences.chinese: 我們有一個路由器，以及思科的e300。

sentences.english: For more information, access the Cisco About Recertification page.
sentences.chinese: 有關詳細信息，請進入思科關於重新認證頁面。

sentences.english: Naturally, Cisco is downplaying the significance of its entrance into servers.
sentences.chinese: 當然，思科在淡化其進入服務器市場的意義。

sentences.english: The launch further diversifies Cisco's offerings.
sentences.chinese: 此舉讓思科的產品進一步分化。

sentences.english: Yahoo, Microsoft and Cisco are also named.
sentences.chinese: 雅虎，微軟和思科也被點名。

sentences.english: "We don't need the money, " says Musk with a wry smile.
sentences.chinese: “我們不需要這個錢，”馬思科苦笑了一下說。

sentences.english: Sonus and Cisco continue to be the strongest challengers posting substantial growth in NAM and EMEA, respectively.
sentences.chinese: 思科仍是最強的挑戰者張貼大幅增長，將由南分別。

sentences.english: It was wonderful, and I’ve liked Rothko ever since.
sentences.chinese: 太美妙了，從那時開始，我喜歡上了羅思科的作品。

sentences.english: Having to cut costs, Cisco centralised the functions of each line.
sentences.chinese: 爲減少成本，思科將每類業務的職能集中。

sentences.english: Cisco maps Token Ring to MAC-level broadcast addresses.
sentences.chinese: 思科地圖令牌環到Mac級廣播地址。

sentences.english: This particularChinese corporation is famous for stealing software source code from Cisco.
sentences.chinese: 這家中國公司最有名的特點就是偷思科公司的源代碼。

sentences.english: Cisco even figured out a way to save on in-house tech-support staff.
sentences.chinese: 思科公司研究出一種能省去家庭技術支持人員的方法。

sentences.english: The rapid development of Sike company benefits more from the new thinking of qualified personnel's recruitment.
sentences.chinese: 思科公司快速發展，更多的得益於人才招募的新思路。

sentences.english: Perhaps no company has done more in this vein than Cisco.
sentences.chinese: 在這方面，或許沒有公司能比思科公司做的更多了。

sentences.english: She serves on the board of Cisco Systems.
sentences.chinese: 她也是思科公司的董事會成員之一。

definition: Google, Internet company and search engine
